transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, ha ji. Bas wapas confirm kar leta hu.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Power back se power pack rubber belt se baat ho rahi hai na Pratik ji se?
Customer: Ha ji, ha ji.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai. To sir, ek kaam karega. Abhi desktop use kar rahe ho to badhiya hai. To usko mai bata deta hu. Jaise aapki ye category hai, aaj se kya karna. Agar lead na dikhe na, V belt hai na aapke pass?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: V belt me kya karna? Pehle to buyleads me jana.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ha. Awaz aa rahi hai na meri?
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Ha ha. Kya karna hai sir? Buyleads me jana. Buyleads me ye bataye mobile se consume karte hai ya desktop se most pe?
Customer: Dono se sir.
Executive: Dono se, thik hai. Desktop pe buylead me ja ke ek bar V belt search kariye. Aapko hai na waha par hai na thodi leads dikhengi. Jaise gates V belt kar ke aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ha, sath hi sath aap kar rahe hai kya?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Sath hi sath mere sath bhi aap desktop pe bhi kar rahe hai kya? Check kar rahe hai?
Customer: Ha ha batao.
Executive: Ha ha. Ek bar V belt pe search kariye. Relevant me aapko kuch lead dikh rahi hongi. Mujhe batayega jaise gates ha ha ye gates V belt kar ke dikh rahi hogi na teen hour pehle aayi hai.
Executive: Unme se mujhe bataye koi lead kaam ki dikh rahi hai kya? Aapke jo bilkul industry related.
Customer: Nahi sir. Sir ye gates way hamare ye hamare brand se related nahi hai sir gates. Gates se alag alag brand hoga ye hamara related nahi hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai. Ye bhi buyleads se related nahi hai. Ek bar upar recent ka recent ka tab hoga.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Us pe click kar ke dekhna recent me koi hai kya related?
Customer: Kuch nahi hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai, kuch nahi hai, mai bhi dekh pa raha hu. Thik hai. To ek kaam karna right side me aaiye past lead ka aapko dikh raha hoga green color ka icon.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Dikh raha hai na sir past lead?
Customer: Ha ji past lead hota hai bata do aap meri past nahi dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Ek bar past lead me ja ke hai na usme search buylead me hai na V belt search kariye.
Customer: Kahan gaya isme sir?
Executive: Ha. Usme dekhiye sabse upar aa raha hoga sun prime V105 rubber V belt hai na? Ha 3120 B105 piece ki aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ha. Inme se, inme se dekhna bhi char panch lead ko click kariye inme se dekhiye koi kaam ki hai?
Customer: Ye to 55 din pehle hai sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi inhe connect nahi karna inhe kya karna hai I am interested mark karna hai. Ye cheez aap jarur karna. Ha sir but sir ye to inme se koi nahi hai sir waise.
Executive: Inme se koi kaam ki nahi hai?
Customer: Ek ye nixon wali hai bas.
Executive: Koi bhi ek bhi dikh jaye na nixon wali hai I am interested mark.
Customer: Nixon wali bhi nixon wali bhi nahi hai sir wo che piece ki hai.
Executive: Che piece ki hai.
Executive: Ek minute mai aapke product line me dekhta hu.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Dobara mai apne end se ek bar product wise search karta hu.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hmm, thik hai. To ek cheez to aap jarur karna isme kyuki mere end se to ye ho nahi payega. Teen char din aap pehle to is cheez ko jarur karna ki yaha par kyuki lead to aa nahi rahi hai waha to waste hoga. Kabhi bhi lead dikhe to waise consume to aap kar hi lenge. To kya karna past lead pe ye thoda aap jyada time spend karna interested mark karne ka. Koi bhi dikhe turant interested mark karna. Nahi nahi nahi sir ye jo aap bata rahe hai ye pehle kar chuka hu mai kafi time ho gaya do saal ho gaye.
Executive: Ha ye to mai keh raha ek point hai. Isko to karna hai ek bar lead manager pe aaiye.
Customer: Sir mujhe sare point batao thoda sa dhyan ye de lo ki leads bahut kam aa rahi hai aur hame na thodi domestic ki jagah export ki lead chahiye char panch 10 lead export ki chahiye humko. Mai ye bol raha hu main point ye hai mera.
Executive: Export ki lead chahiye. Main aapko mainly export ki chahiye.
Customer: Ji. Thodi matlab jyada nahi panch 10 lead hame export ki de dijiye aap domestic ki chhod de matlab domestic ki kam kar dijiye isme panch 10 lead aap export ki jod dijiye.
Executive: Ji ji thik hai. Kyuki domestic lead abhi domestic lead ab jo bhi aa rahi hai sir bekar aa rahi hai wo acche nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukna bas. Ek bar check kar leta hu.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji. Ek bar.
Executive: Ek bar mai dekh lo sir aapke pass cashback hai. Mai wo check kar lu. Ji.
Customer: Ye mai puch raha hu kisi se apne theek hai. New jo nahi hai. Awaaz chali gayi.
Customer: Sun bata. Mai na jab lunch me gaya na maine na is kaam ke liye abhi hai na isko aise karo aur ye na patki hai ki pat pat pat pat. Dusri bar gaya na tab nahi mili wali jab ye patki na mila dhima dhima to sar dard tha thik ho gaya iske baad.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello. Ji ji. Ji ji. Is issue ke regarding ek call transfer kara raha hu. Unhe maine bata diya hai maine message kar diya hai wo abhi aap guide karenge pura. Ji. Thik hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Very good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Ji sir bataye.
Customer: Sir hame jo abhi issue aa raha hai na wo ye hai ki abhi na lead acchi nahi aa rahi hai hamare liye to mai chahta hu ki aap na hame panch 10 lead jo hai export ki do. Domestic ki thodi kam kar do panch 10 lead export ki do.
Executive: Export ki lead sir aap le lijiye waha pe aati hai uska price waha pe jab aap buy karenge to 709 something padta hai ek buylead ka price.
Customer: Uska extra pay karna padega?
Executive: Ha sir export ka to extra pay karna padega na har ek buylead ka.
Executive: Aapke pass IEC code hai import export code hai aapke pass?
Customer: Ha sir.
Executive: Wo aapne update to nahi kiya hua lekin profile pe.
Customer: Update kar deta hu sir mai usko.
Executive: Isko aap update kar dijiye profile pe aur export ka to sir alag hi package hota hai proper. Buylead ka bhi alag hota hai.
Customer: Package to hota hai alag package alag hota hai lekin sir pichle na 15 20 din se na isme domestic koi bhi acchi lead nahi aa rahi matlab purchase to karni padti hai kyuki fir fayda kya hai. To aap jo buylead purchase kar rahe ho to kya problem aa rahi hai na mujhe bataye.
Customer: Sir koi bhi buylead genuine nahi nikalti aise matlab normally fake si buylead aati hai.
Executive: Normally fake si buylead aati hai?
Customer: Ji. Matlab requirement purchase to karte hai but requirement nahi aati unki. Ek second requirement nahi hai wo nahi hai. Mai check kar raha hu abhi.
Executive: Ji. Bataye mujhe aaj aapne ek buylead consume kari hai 8 meter FCD timing belt ki. Prakash hai.
Customer: Ji. Isko ye isko panch piece chahiye the sir.
Executive: Ji. To ye to wahi pe clear mention tha isko che piece chahiye to aapne fir ye consume kyu kari agar aap usme deal nahi karte ho to?
Customer: Sir aisa hota hai na kuch kafi time maine dekha hai kuch aisa ho jata hai ki dai le lete hai ya thode jyada piece le lete hai. Ji. Kyuki point wahi hai na jab lead aa nahi rahi to kuch to purchase karna hi padega sir. Nahi to lead sir aap apne relevant purchase karenge na. Jab aa hi nahi rahi kahan se milenge batao aap. Ab yaha pe 100 piece ki 100 piece ki aa rahi hai na aur che piece ki hum purchase na kare to fayda kya hai fir to ye sari aise hi chali jayegi. Aap minimum order quantity kya rehti hai?
Customer: Sir 50 piece se above man lo aap.
Executive: Ek requirement aayi hui hai abhi Kalyan Maharashtra se Maharashtra me deal karte hai?
Customer: Ha all over India karte hai sir.
Executive: Fan belt 6 PK 1190 ki requirement aayi hui hai. Ek minute sir ek minute. Che ghante pehle ki requirement thi ye aapne kyu consume nahi kari hogi?
Customer: Kaun si sir mere past lead me dekho kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi jo aapki relevant lead hai usme dekhiye teesre number ki requirement hai. Ek minute. Relevant leads me aaiye teesre number ki requirement hai fan belt six PK aur 1190. Sir ye matlab jo lead waisi hai ye usme thik nahi hai unse jaise baat hui thi pehle bhi humne aise lead purchase ki hai isme na 22 go ye waterproof coating fala ye aise bhi cheeze sheet wagera transparent sheet buy karta hai to ye isme deal nahi karta hoga. To isliye aap GST verified bhi nahi hai. Okay. Ab sir ek kaam kariye aap chota sa ek kaam kariye agar aapko leads ka issue aa raha hai na jo bhi aapne latest buyleads consume kari hai latest jo aapne 20 buylead consume kari hai un buyleads ko mujhe excel sheet me likh ke aap bhejiye Ashutosh ko un buylead me aapko likhna hai us customer ka naam unka number aur aapki kya unse baat hui hai wo. Latest 20 buylead ka aap mujhe bhejiye. Ye to aapke samne hi sab ye to khulla hoga na aapke samne. Nahi nahi hame number number nahi dikhta hai sir hame number nahi dikhta hai hame naam dikhta hai bas. Thik hai jo bhi aapki last 20 buylead pe baat hui hai aur jo aapne consume kari hai mai aapko buylead ke naam se. Ha 20 buylead ke number aur unka aapki kya baat hui hai wo aap mujhe ek bar whatsapp kijiye 20 buylead ka fir mai unse ek bar follow up leta hu aur fir mai aapko connect karta hu dobara se thik hai. Thik hai mai kal karta hu ye aapko. Aur jo jo aapne ye video meeting ka aapne concern close open kiya tha to iska kya karna hai sir abhi? Ye to kari nahi sir aapne. Sir video meeting mai schedule kar raha hu lekin wo ho nahi rahi hai google meeting pe. Aap IndiaMART app ke through use karte hai ya fir kaise use karte hai? Sir IndiaMART se sahi karte hai. Matlab phone ke through use karte hai ya system laptop pe use karte hai? Dono sir. Thik hai to ek kaam karta hu mai kal ek video meeting aapki schedule kara deta hu kal aap ek video meeting schedule kar dete hai. Abhi mai Jemsi Choudhary ji Jemsi Choudhary ji hai na wo Choudhary ji dekho unse baat hoti thi meri. Jogender Choudhary. Tab se yahi hai ha tab se yahi hai ki aap matlab samne se mere hisab se teesri bar baat ho rahi hai alag unse. Accha nahi mai to sir Ashutosh ka manager baat kar raha hu. To jo bhi hai maine aapki jo main point hai wo bataya hai ki aise hi jaise aapne bata diya ki kal excel bhej dena aise hi koi na koi kuch na kuch bata deta hai but iska solution nahi hota. Nahi iska solution tabhi to hum karenge aap mujhe excel bhej de na kuch last 20 buylead ka. Aise bolte hai sir. Aise bolte hai. Aise bolte hai pehle bhi unhone kuch manga tha maine whatsapp kiya. Ek bar aap bhejiye sir fir jo karna hoga wo hum karenge apne hisab se. Kal bhej denge. Thik hai aur maine video meeting ka link bhi generate kar diya hai kal 1 baje ka thik hai 1 baje free rahenge na? Subah kar dete sir kyuki 1 baje to lunch time hota hai. Bataye kitne baje ka bhejna hai sir? 10 11 baje kar lo aap. Ek second mujhe dijiye bas. 11 baje aas pass kar lo. Ek second.
Executive: Kal 11 baje kar du 11 baje ka thik rahega? Ha ha ji ha ji kar dijiye. Thik. Mai 11 baje ka ek meeting schedule kar deta hu aur abhi fir is concern ko close kara du? Ji. Thik hai ye concern mai close kara deta hu yaha se iske regarding aapko ek mail aayega. Thik hai. Wo us pe aapko CNM ka hoga ki aap satisfied hai ya nahi jo jis se aapne baat kari hai usse na ki IndiaMART ki service se. Thik hai. Hmm. Wo review IndiaMART ke liye hoga aapke account manager jo Ashutosh hai unke liye hoga. Thik hai. Ji. Score aapka thik hai 88 to ye concern mai abhi close kar deta hu. Ye jo ticket ka video meeting ka aapke pass link aa gaya hoga video meeting ka kal 11 baje ka maine aapko link share kar diya hai. Thik hai mai check karta hu. Ha aap check kar lijiye aur mai close kara raha hu aapko mail aayega to us pe apna feedback de dijiyega. Thik. Okay thank you sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants export leads instead of domestic leads.

- Domestic leads are not genuine.

- Video meeting is not being scheduled.



Resolution:

- Asked to update IEC code on profile.

- Asked to share details of last 20 buyleads.

- Scheduled a video meeting for the next day.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share details of last 20 buyleads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, export, domestic, video meeting
